inputs.name: atinstallpath
inputs.label: AT Install Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The AscentialTest install folder. Example: C:\Program Files (x86)\Zeenyx\AscentialTest

inputs.name: projectpath
inputs.label: Project Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to the AscentialTest project. Example: C:\ProjectPath

inputs.name: workingdirectory
inputs.label: Working Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: The working directory. If you leave this blank the default working directory of your agent will be used

inputs.name: projectname
inputs.label: Project Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the AscentialTest project. Do not include the extension '.zProject'

inputs.name: runtype
inputs.label: Run Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Valid values are 'testset' and 'test'

inputs.name: runtypename
inputs.label: Run Type Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the Test Set or Test to run

inputs.name: testsetoverview
inputs.label: TestSet Overview
inputs.helpMarkDown: A switch to indicate whether to generate the TestSet Overview report

inputs.name: testsummary
inputs.label: TestSet Summary
inputs.helpMarkDown: A switch to indicate whether to generate the TestSet Summary report

inputs.name: testsummaryattr
inputs.label: TestSet Summary Attribute
inputs.helpMarkDown: A switch to indicate whether to generate the TestSet Summary Attribute report

inputs.name: testsetdetail
inputs.label: TestSet Detail
inputs.helpMarkDown: A switch to indicate whether to generate the TestSet Detail report

inputs.name: reportpath
inputs.label: Report Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The location where reports will be generated

inputs.name: reportformat
inputs.label: Report Format
inputs.helpMarkDown: Valid values are 'PDF','HTML','Excel','RTF','Text','TIF'

inputs.name: summaryattribute
inputs.label: Summary Attribute
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the project attribute

inputs.name: outputlevel
inputs.label: Output Level
inputs.helpMarkDown: Valid values are 'Error','Info','Trace'

inputs.name: email
inputs.label: Email
inputs.helpMarkDown: A switch to indicate whether reports should be emailed

inputs.name: checkurl
inputs.label: Checkout URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: The url for project checkout

inputs.name: checkpath
inputs.label: Checkout Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The location to store the AscentialTest project

inputs.name: checkrevision
inputs.label: Checkout Revision
inputs.helpMarkDown: The revision number for project checkout

inputs.name: queryExpression
inputs.label: Test Set query
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Query to be used to select tests from a test set

inputs.name: runonlyfailedtests
inputs.label: Run Only Failed Tests
inputs.helpMarkDown: A switch that indicates whether to run only failed tests

inputs.name: testarguments
inputs.label: Test Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: A space delimited string of test arguments in the format ArgName=value

inputs.name: targetcomputers
inputs.label: Target Computers
inputs.helpMarkDown: A comma delimited list of target computers
